Reviews.Title: “JP, Your Property is A Joke”
Reviews.Author: gary s
Reviews.Content: The recent 5 star ratings this dump of a hotel were all written by one man, their sleazy GM JP Pirzada. Read the reviews yourself and tell me tat they don't sound like the GM defending his garbage dump. If you want REAL reviews written by REAL people I suggest you read all the 1 star reviews. All those people got it write. This is a one star pile of trash... with its joke of a GM, JP Pirzada. Good luck writing those positive reviews JP. It must be difficult to lie so much about your property!

Reviews.Title: “Only for the Budget-minded”
Reviews.Author: TravelingwestI10
Reviews.Content: This is an older property and not well maintained. Everything in the room worked which was a pleasant surprise after the initial evaluation. The bed sheets were clean but the carpet and furniture definitely could use updating. Breakfast advertised as continental but you'll want to eat elsewhere - there's a Denny's down the street. Stayed here because it was close to the ballpark but will look elsewhere next time. Not up to typical Ramada standards.

Reviews.Title: “YUCK! Do Not Stay”
Reviews.Author: beccacc31
Reviews.Content: My mom and I stayed here for two nights April 2nd & 3rd. I tried to get out of there before we actually had to spend the night but EVERYTHING was booked. Rooms are dirty and dank. Grounds are dirty and unkept. I could actually see from the inside out around the door jam. I slept with the lights on due to fear of roaches and lizards because we were exposed to the outside. While at a breakfast at a local ST Cloud institution a police officer joked that the reason we could see around the door jam was because they have to plow there way into the rooms so often there. Overall just a really nasty place.

Reviews.Title: “Spend a little more and go elsewhere.”
Reviews.Author: Heidi R
Reviews.Content: Service was decent when we checked in but when we got to the room it was not vacummed - would not even let my 3 year old to crawl and play. Pulled the sheets back since we were skeptical and there were holes in the comforter and odd stains on the sheets. Stayed in room 240, maybe this one has not been renovated yet. Moldy bathroom and spots all over the couch; we were not comfortable at all. Stayed on a Tuesday night and still took 4 hours to get housekeeping to replace the sheets and vacuum the floors. Planned on staying 2 nights but cancelled 2nd night and drove 2 hours home after Sea World the next day just to avoid another night there. Air conditioner was extremely loud and mini-fridge was lopsided and didn't seem to be functioning correctly. TV took 5 times to turn on, kept randomly shutting off. Spend just a little more and get yourself a clean room with continental breakfast... definately will NOT be back. Didn't think it was going to be that bad based on other reviews I read but it was, I am not exaggerating.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place!”
Reviews.Author: RayGerard
Reviews.Content: I think "NeoC" is someone who is purposefully trying cause an "issue" as it's funny Neo would know dates and times of events and access to Internet webpages... The Ramada is an excellent place to stay during events because it helps people by not driving home drunk. ANY venue is welcomed to use the facilities just like many other hotels do to help folks set up parties and events! What better place to stay than the Ramada Heritage, where it's clean and the management are nice and accommodating! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!

Reviews.Title: “loved our stay”
Reviews.Author: Lizstoy
Reviews.Content: I really do not understand the negative reviews and the information stated by others that has nothing to do with a first-hand experience at the Ramada. We stayed at this hotel and was pleased with the resort and grounds. The rooms and facility were clean and the decorations were modern and classy. The beds were very comfortable and provided a really good night sleep. My children loved the pool and enjoyed themselves during our stay. We had dinner there and it was fantastic. The staff was friendlly and provided us with every request we had in a timely matter. This hotels location was very convient, since it is right off the Florida Turnpike on 192. For the price you can not beat it.

Reviews.Title: “Great Atmosphere and always improving!!”
Reviews.Author: Danny R
Reviews.Content: Been to the Ramada quite a few times and have never had a negative response about it!! To all the other people that respond negatively, if you want 1st class, I suggest you go to a 1st class Hotel/ Motel!! When there is Adult Events being held on premise, the crew makes sure that the non participating guests of the hotel are safe and the participants are not open to the public view! The Crew has worked very hard to make it safe for everyone attending or not attending the events at the Hotel! There is no open nudity allowed outside closed doors, everything has been and always will remain behind closed doors!! We will return back many times to the Ramada!!!

Reviews.Title: “come and check it out for yourself..”
Reviews.Author: bgpoppapunn
Reviews.Content: ramada is just a hotel that happens to host all types of partys sweetsixteen, dog shows, etc, the rates are awesome compared to other locations in the area. the tavern (bottom up ) have great fresh food u get more food then what u pay for..you donot get that everywhere.I been to plenty of hotels and had worse service and pay outrageous prices for both room and food rates. glad that we found this place.

Reviews.Title: “Run Away”
Reviews.Author: rtbabe
Reviews.Content: I wouldn't waste my time writting a review so I'm just copying the previous one. One hundred plus travel days a year this is by far my worst experience. It's not even a case of you get what you pay for. When I finaly asked to see the owner, a mohawk wearing, tattoo laden, individual in shorts and a tank top said he represented the owner and started to yell at me in the lobby, "If you don't like it, check the hell out". Room was dirty, towels looked liked they were used to wash floors, tub wouldn't drain, smoke alarm started beeping during the night, cable TV?- 32 channels half of them you could even see,after two days maid would not leave coffee or cups or clean bath mat. Repeat calls to front desk got little response. Breakfast was a joke with stale cereal, no fruit, coffee cups that held about 6 oz. As a bonus you get COCKROACHES IN YOUR SUIT CASE WHEN YOU LEAVE!! On site restaurant??

Reviews.Title: “Watch out if you have Kids!”
Reviews.Author: Neo C
Reviews.Content: If you have a family with young children, you should know before you book your room that this resort hosts swinger parties on site every Friday and Saturday. They call it "Club Secrets" and it is connected to the building. They also have an area for people attending to have sex with that they met in the club, without needing to book a hotel room. Of course, the caution tape seperating that pathway near the hotel pool sure does make it right to have kids watch them go back and forth all night long! Either run a resort or a swingers club -- Do not attempt both. Some things kids do not need to see or hear! Check out their website for yourself, http://www.hedoevents.com/kissimmee.html

Reviews.Title: “Avoid at all Cost”
Reviews.Author: Russell V
Reviews.Content: Room was dirty, towels looked liked they were used to wash floors, tub wouldn't drain, smoke alarm started beeping during the night, cable TV?- 32 channels half of them you could even see,after two days maid would not leave coffee or cups or clean bath mat. Repeat calls to front desk got little response. Breakfast was a joke with stale cereal, no fruit, coffee cups that held about 6 oz. As a bonus you get COCKROACHES IN YOUR SUIT CASE WHEN YOU LEAVE!! On site restaurant??

Reviews.Title: “Denied Confirmed and Completed Reservation at Check-in”
Reviews.Author: Arkady123
Reviews.Content: This hotel is a disgrace to the Ramada chain of hotels. It should do everyone a favor and shut itself down. I had a confirmed and paid-for reservation at this hotel. On arriving at the hotel, I was told that the hotel had overbooked itself by 30 rooms due to some glitch in their booking systems. And hence, they could not honor my booking along with all 30 others, even though it had already been confirmed through their systems and fully paid for! Now, I was unable to get another hotel since it was a busy time of the year, and hence, had to cancel all my travel plans locally and return back home. Something like this speaks to the total incompetence of the people running this establishment. I hope the authorities just shut them down for good.

Reviews.Title: “Clean & Comfortable”
Reviews.Author: justchuckfl
Reviews.Content: This is not a luxury property, but for the price I found it to be very clean & comfortable. The room had all the amenities such as coffeemaker, hairdryer and even a small fridge. Linens and towels were fresh and clean. We had a meal at the restaurant, service was very good and while the menu lacked a lot of variety what we had was good. Overall, great value for the price!

Reviews.Title: “Personal stay”
Reviews.Author: Jess517
Reviews.Content: This is a great place to stay and they are upgrading it constantly.

Reviews.Title: “Family stay”
Reviews.Author: Megan D
Reviews.Content: We stayed for an event and the food and rooms were amazing. The food was fantastic and the server was great and made us feel welcome. Room furniture was much better than anything imaginable for such a low price. We will be coming back for summer fun.

Reviews.Title: “Surprisingly good for a Ramada Inn”
Reviews.Author: LARPAT55
Reviews.Content: I have had many bad experiences with the Ramada chain in general and was planning to avoid Ramada forever. However, after being exhausted from marathon driving, I pulled into the first place I could find close to the highway. This Ramada Inn is the best I have stayed in, and I guess it depends on who owns the franchise. The room and beds were very comfortable, and while I cannot comment on much else since I left early in the a.m. and just slept there, the rate was very fair and I would definitely recommend this Ramada to anyone staying in Kissimmee.

Reviews.Title: “We Will Stay Again !”
Reviews.Author: Katie772
Reviews.Content: We traveled to Kissimmee, Fl and found this hotel and we are glad we did. The front desk service was very polite and very helpful to us they knew where everything was which is helpful for lost people. The overall hotel is great, some construction, the new owner apologized and explained which is awesome! We are traveling back to florida again and we will stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Great time Thank you to the staff!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Crystal P
Reviews.Content: Our visit there has been great. Looks like they have a lot of work going on. Property is looking great. Would stay here again. Staff was very helpful getting us to the parks and local attractions. Nice job!! The Parker Family!!

Reviews.Title: “Excited by hotels vision”
Reviews.Author: brickandfire
Reviews.Content: We stayed the week of September 18th and met the new owners and what a pleasant crew. We had to move around some new construction in the restaurant and tiki bar but each morning the transformation was incredible. The owner took us for a tour explaining the new vision of the hotel and wow. We definately look forward to visiting next year.

Reviews.Title: “Crap,dirty hostil manager”
Reviews.Author: sixto e
Reviews.Content: We are upset because when we arrived on Friday March 11 at 9:00 pm we were told that our reservation was cancelled because my credit card was invalid. Two days before to our arrival I called by phone from Puerto Rico to confirme that our honeymoon stay was in place. And answer from the Ramada on Wednesday March 9 was that our stay was confirmed. On March 11 at 12 pm we decided to check where was the exact Hotel location prior to go to our 1st theme park. We step in and the lady at front desk check for us again the our reservation was in place. Also we asked at what time started the checking and her answer was 3pm. Right after we departure to the park. At 9pm we got back to the hotel and the front desk called Jay asked for last name. he proceeded to check on th our last name he informed us that we were not at the lost of guess expected that day. I explained to him that there shall be a mistake because we when there at lunchtime and the reservation was in place. When I asked my last name. But when the day 11 March at 9:00 pm Front desk person (Jay) told us that there was no reservation. after 30 minutes of suffering, not knowing where to go, Jay call priceline and they supposedly said that if there was reservation. for high gave us a twin room when my Wife and I got married recently and have to sleep in a bed little uncomfortable. we want to charge $ 300 more for just changing a bed and is cruel and unfair. if you could go to another hotel I would do it but I was late. I have no money to pay another.

Reviews.Title: “AVOID, AVOID AVOID!!! Dont Stay here!!!”
Reviews.Author: BlueHabibi
Reviews.Content: Rude staff, on the phone when I did the check-in. Dont even looked me in the eye. No breakfast even though it is offered as one of the amenities. AC didnt work and toilet didnt flush. Maintenance fixed the AC but not the toilet. Great! Surroundings and building look awfull. Thank God it was only one night. A bunch of drunks at the pool bar until late in the morning. Who could sleep?? Around 12 midnight a group of these drunks stopped at my front door to chit chat, laugh and make non stop noises. Called the front desk, nothing happened. Call the 2nd time and threat them that I was going to call the police, then they sent someone. Party dismissed. No I will never stay here again even for free! They should shut down the place.

Reviews.Title: “Worst Hotel In Kissimmee By FAR!!! Avoid at all costs!”
Reviews.Author: Rory1212
Reviews.Content: Stayed here at the beginning of July, 2011. The room was horrible. The bed had bugs, the shower and toilet were filthy, the non smoking room smelled like cigars. When I was checking in late at night I actually heard rats in the walls squealing at the fron desk. The wi-fi internet did not work. There restaurant food was terrible and more expensive than most top quality restaurants. This place is a DUMP! Do not book here. Do not stay here. If you have and have noticed this to please file a complaint with www.ramada.com so they can shut this place down. The GM calls himself Colonal JP... talk about weird. His name is Jawad Pirzada and he does NOTHING to help his guests. He returned NONE of my calls or e-mails.

Reviews.Title: “Rates change by the minute, won't stay there again.”
Reviews.Author: HappyCouple2450
Reviews.Content: The normal rate is about $45 to $49 a night. Except when it is late and raining. It changed to $79.95 when I went to check in at about 9:30 pm after driving 11 hours in the rain. I complained to the manager and was told that is with in the guidelines of Ramada procedures.

Reviews.Title: “It's ok... I guess”
Reviews.Author: KCSavGuy
Reviews.Content: Not what I'd expect from a Ramada but it's an ok place as long as all u plan to do is sleep there.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT PLACE TO STAY- rented 7 rooms for several days.”
Reviews.Author: Pat60739
Reviews.Content: We recently had family members from several US states come to the area to attend a funeral and we rented 7 rooms for several nights. . The hotel staff was fantastic and the hotel was excellent for the money. It was great to have such a nice friendly atmosphere to socialize before and after the actual funeral. My hats off to the hotel and its staff.

Reviews.Title: “In need of repair & scary "complimentary" breakfast”
Reviews.Author: LightBlueSkies
Reviews.Content: The location was convenient, check-in and -out staff were friendly, bed comfortable and A/C working. Electric outlets by A/C and bed not working. Floor lamp by A/C on an orange extension cord to bedside electrical outlet, which didn't work. Plugged it in by sink outlet to read in bed for a while, since the TV remote was missing. Who wants to stand by the TV and change channels anymore? Bathroom floor dirty, behind toilet and beside tub. The clear sealant around the tub edge preserved the dirt for all time. And, a hole in a wall. At check-out, we gave a list of problems and received "uh huh" and 'OK." At check-in, we were told of the complimentary breakfast. At 7:10 a.m. the next morning, we saw 2 dry cereal dispensers with crumbs on counter beneath - no effort to catch crumbs for clean-up. Instant oatmeal packets - get the hot water from the coffee machine. Convenience store pastries laid out. Powdered creamer for coffee. Bagels to toast and cream cheese and margarine packets. No jam packets. But the scary part was the no less than ten loaves of white sandwich bread, wrapped in 2 slice packets and stacked up. How old were they? By the way, on our return trip, we stayed at a hotel in south GA. For $7 more than this place, we had a wonderful room and hot/cold buffet breakfast, including pre-made omlets, sausage, fresh fruit salad and even make-it-yourself waffles. That hotel chain is what we'll use from now on.

Reviews.Title: “WOW... This was by far the best hotel I have ever stayed at.”
Reviews.Author: crewcut_10
Reviews.Content: The staff and management there were extremely helpful and accomidating. I had some problems with my computer and Two managers worked with me on that problem for 2 hours, and they solved it. The room was as clean as I have ever experienced, and the hot breakfast was delicious. It was very quiet and convenient. I can't say enough good things about this place, and no, I have no connection to the hotel. This is my unbiased opinion. Cudos to Chris and brian. " I'll be back."

Reviews.Title: “Relieved to leave this facility”
Reviews.Author: kleenfreekOhio
Reviews.Content: This hotel is in bad need of repair, cleaning, maintenance, etc. The bathroom was dirty with mold growing in many areas. Some of the people in the office were rude. A hotel does not need a lot of extras but cleanliness is of the utmost importance. I don't plan to ever stay there again for any reason!

Reviews.Title: “VERY NICE HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: deem1955
Reviews.Content: Well me and my family stay at this hotel and founf to be not a 5 stay but clean and for the price l would recommend my family to stay . The front desk staff great you with a smily and you feel like home espically their is on staff name Dee very pleasant person and the way she treat people i would rcommend people for this hotel. the room were clean but could be a lttle bit better in cleaning but the overall l would recommed this hotel to all my friend and family.keep up the good work. Breafast were ok just a cont. one but it were ok

Reviews.Title: “Not bad for the price”
Reviews.Author: WilfredSazili
Reviews.Content: The hotel itself is nothing spectacular. For the money we paid (it was a package deal) I think it was worth it. The room was clean. Carpets needed refurbishing and looked well worn. The pool was just outside our room and though we did not use it - it looked quite clean. We had a little problem with a clogged drain in the shower but after letting the front desk know, when we returned that evening, we found that during our absence it had been cleared. The cord of the cofee maker was so short that it could only be used when kept beside the sink. We could not use it anywhere else. So we had to switch it on only after everyone had finished using the sink. Breakfast was OK - slices of bread, limitless coffee and tea, Danish and bagels. Toasters were new. There was also a microwave that one could use if needed. Saw no service during breakfast hours. Management and staff were quite friendly. Though we had paid in advance for a 6 night stay, we were surprised to discover that the front desk had checked us out after the first night. When asked about this, the reply from the front desk was,"Mistakes do happen". Though the weather was very hot, I'm pleased to say that the A/C worked really well and we had to use blankets. That was the best part. All in all - for the money we paid, I think we got a pretty good deal. If visiting Disney, I think I'd rather stay closer to Disney since almost 30 to 35 minutes were lost each day commuting back and forth.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value”
Reviews.Author: altoonabud
Reviews.Content: Not a five star, but good value for your money. Rooms,pool, and surrounding area clean. Close enough to area attractions but without all the congestion. Manager was on site to handle any problems, however we had none. I'd star there again Allen

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed our stay”
Reviews.Author: flamin-g0fun
Reviews.Content: Despite all the negative reviews, we booked 2 nights here from an online travel website. Our room was great and everything was clean. Our room smelled really fresh and clean when we got in and the internet was a plus. The pool was really quiet and we were the only ones in there, so it was more of a private pool which we also enjoyed. The hotel is a great location between everywhere, from Disney to many locations on the same highway, including dining variety. The staff was very friendly to us and the main lobby has a very nice simple style to it. We had a really relaxing stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Ewwwww!”
Reviews.Author: Gingerbug
Reviews.Content: We had to stay there because of a cheerleading competition. This hotel was right down the street from the Silver Spurs Arena. Everyone of the parents compained to the coach that we didn't want to stay there after reading all of the reviews on Trip Advisor. She insisted that she had stayed there before and it would be fine. Oh my god! How nasty this place was. We made the best of it, but ewww! I would have rather forked out the money myself of everyone to stay at the Peabody. Dust build up in all of the corners. Vomit floating in the pool. Perverted maintenance guys staring at the teenage girls while they were trying to practice their routine in the grass. Let's just say, they coach agreed with us after that stay.

HotelInfo.Name: Ramada Heritage Park
HotelInfo.Address: 2145 E Irlo Bronson Memorial Hwy., Hwy 192, Kissimmee, FL 34744
